channel.title: CVE Feed for gsuvorov -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gsuvorov -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9627|2024-10-22T14:22:38.117Z -- gsuvorov -- teplobot%20%E2%80%93%20telegram%20bot%20for%20wp
item.description: The TeploBot - Telegram Bot for WP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure due to missing authorization checks on the 'service_process' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view the Telegram Bot Token, which is a secret token to control the bot.

item.title: CVE-2024-9627|2024-10-22T06:50:30.492Z -- gsuvorov -- teplobot%20%E2%80%93%20telegram%20bot%20for%20wp
item.description: The TeploBot - Telegram Bot for WP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure due to missing authorization checks on the 'service_process' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view the Telegram Bot Token, which is a secret token to control the bot.
